resources.string: Do you want to delete the category?
Do you want to clear the category?
Stick category content to the bottom
Edit icons according to icon pack settings
Leave it empty to disable lock
Use volume buttons to switch categories
Backup finished. Backup file can be found at
Do you want to change the icon of %s?

Swipe left/right on the apps menu to switch categories. Click on the category name to see the categories list. 
 
Open Launcher settings/Category manager to edit categories. 
 
Click on the search button to search through all apps (except hidden). To search in the web, open search, type ... and click an arrow at the right of the text field. 
 
Long-press an app icon to open the popup menu. 
 
Press Home button to open home category. Press once again to open all apps list. 
 
Press Back button to switch to the previously opened category.

Emerald Launcher (v%s) 
 
Copyright 2018 Anri Dellal 
 
Licensed under GPL-v3.0-only 
Want to help? Report bugs and submit suggestions via GitHub (https://www.github.com/HenriDellal/emerald) or Google Play listing(http://play.google.com/details?id=ru.henridellal.emerald).

All contributors.
